title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull & push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings or chat providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builders and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting, embedding and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight Node package for streaming chat completions from local Ollama.

title: ollama-embed
summary: PyPI micro-library that wraps Ollama’s embeddings endpoint for vector-search demos.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat over PDFs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into channels with slash commands.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client generated from Ollama’s OpenAPI spec; supports chat, pull, push.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers threads using local Ollama models with configurable timeouts.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.
